column3: What age bracket are you in?
column4: Are you pursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree?
column5: Are you a domestic or international student?

column11: Did you own a computer/laptop for online learning during the pandemic?
column12: How did you access your course material during the pandemic?
column13: What online communication services did you use during the pandemic?
column14: Was it easy to adapt to new learning communication services during the online learning?
column15: Was the communication clear and helpful about the pandemic provided by the university?
column16: Did you have a quiet and safe place to study during the pandemic?
column17: What do you think is the best learning process after the pandemic?
column18: How do you describe online learning compared to in-person learning?
column19: Were you motivated during online learning to attend or stay in class?
column20: Where did you spend most of your time studying during the pandemic?
column21: Did you manage your time more effectively and efficiently compared to in-person?
column22: How much effort did you put into online learning compared to in-person during the pandemic?
column23: Did the university provide you with tutoring services during the pandemic?
column24: Did the professors post the recorded lectures during the pandemic?
column25: Was it easy to learn from recorded lectures compare to in-person?
column26: Did the professor provide you with flexible hours to work on your coursework during the pandemic?
column27: Did the professors conduct virtual office hours and were they easy to access during the pandemic?
column28: Was it easy to communicate with your professors during online learning?
column29: Were you comfortable communicating and expressing your opinion with the professors during online learning/office hours?
column30: Did your professor give you enough time to discuss course material during online learning?
column31: Did you have a good relationship with your professor compared to in-person during the online learning environment?
column32: Did the professor use the online technology provided efficiently during the online learning?
column33: Did you change your degree or field of specialization during the pandemic?
column34: Did you lose opportunities in terms of research/internship during the pandemic?
column35: Was it easy to use the services of the academic advising/student services during the pandemic?
column36: When the university opened back (hybrid learning), were you forced to withdraw from certain courses due to the proof of vaccination directive?
column37: Did you have access to services such as sports centres or extracurriculars during the pandemic?
column38: Were you forced to delay your graduation because of the pandemic?
column39: Did you require extra time for exams/tests/quizzes compared to in-person learning?
column40: Was the grading scale for exams/quizzes/tests fair in online learning compared to in- person?
column41: Did you feel your grade were lower compared to in-person learning?
column42: Did the professor communicate clear exam instructions?
column43: Were you concerned about your personal data during online proctoring?
column44: Do you think you received the same quality of education compared to in-person learning?
column45: Did you feel the course load was heavy during the online learning?
column46: Did you receive feedback on time for your coursework compared to in-person?
column47: How difficult was it to balance school and personal life during the pandemic?
column48: How do you describe your relationship with your peers during online learning?
column49: Was online learning more stressful than in-person learning?
column50: Did you suffer from anxiety or depression during the pandemic?
column51: Did you have access to mental health services from the university during the pandemic?
column52: Were you concerned about your social and emotional health during the pandemic?
column53: Are you concerned with online learning environment having an impact entering the job market?
column54: Did you face financial difficulty during the pandemic?
